name: Prototype Starglitter
description: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

passiveDescription.0: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>8%</cryo> for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
passiveDescription.1: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>10%</cryo> for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
passiveDescription.2: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>12%</cryo> for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
passiveDescription.3: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>14%</cryo> for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
passiveDescription.4: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>16%</cryo> for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
